name: rattlingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to emphasize that something is very good, very exciting, or keeps your attention: This is a rattlingly good story, but clearly not a new one. His portrayal is rattlingly intense.
More examplesFewer examplesThey produce rattlingly fine pop music.The rattlingly good plot is made all the more exciting because it's based on a true story.She is a formidable woman, but also rattlingly good company.He is a rattlingly good storyteller, with a gift for holding the reader’s attention from the first page to the last.
